data.name: RISING BONEvR
data.detailed_description:
The game focuses on physical interaction with the world, and how dynamic everything in it. Most of the tasks can be solved in different ways. E.g: to pass the closed door, you can find a key, or destroy the padlock, or break the window nearby, or find the underpass

Each circle of hell is a level where you need to climb as high as possible at any cost. Haron will take you to next level. If desired, you can find funny or creepy secrets, part of story, or collectible items

---------------------

You ended up in hell, at the very bottom of it. You are given a chance to get out of it, going through all the circles of hell. But you do not know what kind of person you were and what surrounded you.
Is it worth trying to come back at all? Climbing higher and higher you will find more knowledge about the world which was around you, and what was your role in it.
data.about_the_game:

Is it worth trying to come back at all? Climbing higher and higher you will find more knowledge about the world which was around you, and what was your role in it.
data.short_description: (First level demo available!) Physics based puzzle about climbing out of deep hell without any legs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes:
Visual jokes about sex, suicide, murder. Possibly offensive memes.
Slightly creepy situations or scenes. Might be scary for some people
